generated.css: *{margin:0;padding:0}.clearfix:after{content:"";display:block;clear:both}svg{width:1em;height:1em;vertical-align:-.15em;fill:currentColor;overflow:hidden}body{background-color:#eee}#player{margin:5px auto 0;width:400px;height:720px;padding-bottom:20px;background-color:#ebeae9;overflow:hidden;box-shadow:0 1px 6px 0 rgba(32,33,36,.28)}#player .songTop{padding-top:20px;padding-bottom:3%}#player .songTop h2{font-weight:400;font-size:18px;color:#191918;text-align:center}#player .songTop p{font-size:16px;color:#888786;text-align:center;padding-top:10px}#player .songMain{overflow:hidden;width:200%;height:calc(100% - 220px);max-height:70vh;transition:transform .3s;display:flex;align-items:flex-start}#player .songMain .panel-effect{width:100%;height:100%;display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center}#player .songMain .panel-effect .cover{width:100%;height:76%;display:flex;justify-content:center}#player .songMain .panel-effect .cover .square{width:320px;height:320px;border-radius:5px;overflow:hidden;box-shadow:0 20px 40px 0 hsla(0,0%,83.1%,.7)}#player .songMain .panel-effect .cover .square img{width:100%;height:100%}#player .songMain .panel-effect .mini-lyric{height:4em;padding-top:1.8em}#player .songMain .panel-effect .mini-lyric p{text-align:center;font-size:14px;color:#888786;margin:.5em 0}#player .songMain .panel-effect .mini-lyric p.current{color:#191918}#player .songMain .panel-lyrics{width:100%;height:100%;box-shadow:inset 0 0 30px 20px #ebeae9;position:relative}#player .songMain .panel-lyrics .shadow{position:absolute;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%;box-shadow:0 0 30px 20px #ebeae9}#player .songMain .panel-lyrics .shadow:after{top:0}#player .songMain .panel-lyrics .shadow:after,#player .songMain .panel-lyrics .shadow:before{display:block;width:100%;content:"";position:absolute;left:0;box-shadow:0 0 30px 50px #ebeae9}#player .songMain .panel-lyrics .shadow:before{bottom:-2px}#player .songMain .panel-lyrics .container{transition:all .3s}#player .songMain .panel-lyrics .container p{text-align:center;font-size:14px;color:#888786;margin:1em 0}#player .songMain .panel-lyrics .container p.current{color:#191918;font-weight:700}#player .songMain.active{transform:translateX(-100%)}#player .songBottom .option{display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center}#player .songBottom .option svg{width:24px;height:24px;margin-right:18%;fill:#636261}#player .songBottom .option svg:nth-child(4){margin-right:0}#player .songBottom .bar-area{padding:6% 0 4%;width:90%;margin:0 auto}#player .songBottom .bar-area .bar{height:2px;background-color:#888786;margin:0 5px}#player .songBottom .bar-area .bar .progress{width:0;height:100%;position:relative;background-color:#191918}#player .songBottom .bar-area .bar .progress:after{content:"";display:block;position:absolute;top:-4px;right:-5px;width:10px;height:10px;border-radius:50%;background-color:#191918}#player .songBottom .bar-area .time{padding-top:16px;font-size:12px}#player .songBottom .bar-area .time .time-start{float:left}#player .songBottom .bar-area .time .time-end{float:right}#player .songBottom .actions{display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center}#player .songBottom .actions svg{width:24px;height:24px}#player .songBottom .actions svg:first-child{width:20px;height:20px;margin-right:10%}#player .songBottom .actions svg:last-child{margin-left:10%}#player .songBottom .actions svg:nth-child(2n){width:28px;height:28px}#player .songBottom .actions svg:nth-child(3){width:46px;height:46px;margin:0 12%}.QRcode{position:fixed;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.521);transition:all .6s}.QRcode.active{height:0}.QRcode .child{transition:all .6s;overflow:hidden;width:100vw;height:100vh;display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center}.QRcode .child.active{height:0}.QRcode .child .text h3{font-weight:400;color:#fff;font-size:1em;text-align:center;padding-bottom:10px}.QRcode .child .text img{width:200px;height:200px}.QRcode .collapse{cursor:pointer;width:58px;height:30px;background-color:#fff;position:absolute;bottom:0;left:50%;margin-left:-29px;border-top-left-radius:5px;border-top-right-radius:5px;display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center;border:1px solid #ccc}.QRcode .collapse svg{animation:drift 1s linear infinite}.QRcode .collapse.active{bottom:-30px;border-top-left-radius:0;border-top-right-radius:0;border-bottom-left-radius:5px;border-bottom-right-radius:5px}@keyframes drift{0%{transform:translateY(3px)}50%{transform:translateY(-3px)}to{transform:translateY(3px)}}
